Comment: Independenly of my comment above, I think a “else nc->rect.y = 0;” would make sense here, right?

Author: Michael Stapelberg
Comment: Actually, x and y are signed, but we don’t declare them as such to avoid gazillions of type casts. See the comment in include/data.h. I think this is the wrong place to fix the issue.
